Got so many compliments on these at Friendsgiving. Size up for washing/shrinkage but the wait is elastic!

I think the print is really cute and the quality is not bad. It's just if your short or have a short torso this item might not be the best choice. I am 5'1 and they covered almost all of my torso up to my chest. Was really sad, because I was looking forward to wearing these.

评论概述: Not great quality. Not worth the price
评论详情: They look nice but the fabric is not great. Quite thin and a bit scratchy. SHEIN quality. They fit a little on the small side. Not decided if I like them enough to keep them. If they were like $20 I would but the price is a bit more than the quality honestly.
The zipper doesn’t work and the hem of the pants was not sew up. I tried the pants on. I felt like it would rip pulling the zipper up. Very disappointing.
I’m probably a size 25 and the small was still too big for me! Runs bigger! Wish there was an XS!
I wanted to love these, but they didn’t even go over my hips. I usually do not have this issue with jeans.
I didn't love these. They look very y2k, but I'm over 50 and it's not for me. I did pick up leopard overalls, which are great.

评论概述: Material was not the greatest and fit was not ideal
评论详情: I really wanted to love these leopard print jeans because the **print is exactly what I was looking for**—bold, fun, and just the right style! Unfortunately, the **fit was not great**. They’re a bit tight in some areas and loose in others, so they don’t sit as comfortably as I’d hoped. Also, they’re not very long, which was disappointing as I was hoping for more coverage.  If you're mainly after the print, these are fantastic, but if you’re looking for a great fit and good material, you might want to keep searching.
I sized up to get a bit of a baggy look and I definitely do not recommend. If you’re going to buy these at all get a size down. Overall not flattering
The fit was horrible, I returned it
you get what you pay for. they were so thin and not even denim.

评论概述: So cute but sizing is terrible
评论详情: These are really nice pants, they feel like a lightweight jean. Perfect for fall. The zipper looks cheap though, I’m not sure it will last. I’m a size 32 waist and ordered that. I couldn’t even pull it together to attempt to button them. The rest of the pants fit beautifully. Unfortunately, I’ll have to return them. Although I’m sad about it. I really love the print. I wish I could keep them.
Love these pants

评论概述: Very Odd Fit (For a women's US 14)
评论详情: I am a very true women's size 14 for every brand, but this size chart seemed odd, so I checked the reviews for sizing. I saw someone who said they are a size 10-12 and a large fit them well, with a little room to spare, so I purchased both a large and an extra large. I could barely fit the extra large over my hips, and could barely zip them shut they were so tight. So I decided to try a 2XL because I like the jeans' print. The 2XL is even crazier, very very tight in the hips, especially where the thigh bends, but the waist is gigantic and goes up right under my chest. I am about 5'5-5'6 and never have this problem with jeans. I could see how maybe this could work if you are smaller and want that "baggy" low-rise fit, but if you are hoping for any other type of fit or are larger than a size 10, I would avoid these jeans.
Run small in my opinion with no stretch. Very cute tho!

I bought 2 pair in 2 different sizes! In the pic I am wearing the small. I am 5’8, size 2/4 for reference.  The medium is a little bit more of a boyfriend fit than these with a little extra length. I did find it weird that the small is extremely high waisted and has a different tag / brand name? But they’re still cute.
(dont mind my shirt) honestly im in love they so cute nd swag. size chart is real accurate btw
literally gives looks a box around the zipper area. the inseam is wayyy too long and sags to like, the mid thigh
Really cropped and baggy. Not a good look.
Heck yeah. Legit!! Material same as advertisement everything and I’m 5’8 and they are still long I love them!

I sized down for these jeans but I think I couldve gotten away with a large to feel more comfortable. The pants were not as long as I thought. I am 5'5 and about 160lbs with an athletic build, thicker thighs, bigger bum, and hourglass figure. it hugged my waist perfectly and was snug in the butt area but made it look great. it was a challenge to get them over my thighs and bum but it was great once I got them up. I recommend going with your normal size. I got a medium but wouldve been more comfortable in a large.
They are just awful.
Love the print however the design is odd.

I realllly liked these, in my opinion they look way better in person. I’m normally a size 10, sometimes an 8 and originally ordered an XL due to the previous reviews but they were too big. I exchanged for a size L & they fit perfectly. Not too tight and not too loose.

评论概述: Way too short and not as wide or baggy as they look!
评论详情: These are terrible. I warned my daughter due to the reviews I’d read, but she wanted me to get these and bring them to Canada. As a result we can’t return them. They are ridiculously short and narrow at the ankle, not wide like the photo, and so small at the waist that they have to be very high waisted. A waste of money.
These are some nice jeans! They look like Levi’s and the fit is amazing! I’m a 12 and ordered a Large and they fit nicely! The length is great too, not long!
Not at all what is advertised. Cheap material and sizing is WAY off. Not accurately described in the measurements.
I’m 5’5 and they were too short. I purchased a size medium which was a good size but if o go up a size the pants would be too big around the waste and crotch area.

评论概述: THESE ARE A WANT AND A NEED RUNNNNNN
评论详情: These are so cute and honestly amazing quality, I love them!!!! I'm around 5'5 and they go all the way down to make feet & about 125 pounds with a 26" waist depending on the pants. I think I'm gonna return to get a medium just because I like my jeans baggy but if you want them form-fitting I would get your normal size. They're snug on my waist and I have a 26" waist.
